content: BEGINNING my studies, the first step pleas'd me so much,   The mere fact, consciousness--these forms--the power of motion,   The least insect or animal--the senses--eyesight--love;   The first step, I say, aw'd me and pleas'd me so much,   I have hardly gone, and hardly wish'd to go, any farther,   But stop and loiter all the time, to sing it in extatic songs.
cleaned: beginning my studies the first step pleas d me so much the mere fact consciousness these forms the power motion the least insect or animal the senses eyesight love the first step i say aw d me and pleas d me so much i hardly gone and hardly wish d go any farther but stop and loiter all the time sing it extatic songs
